a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and covers all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted for
inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2023)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2015 prices.
